purpleculture_pinyin:
qióng
jasper; fine jade; beautiful; exquisite (e.g. wine, food); abbr. for Hainan province
Джаспер; мелкий нефрит; красивая; изысканный (например, вино, еда); сокр. для провинции Хайнань
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 琼)
Pictophonetic: 敻 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
瓊脂 [ qióng zhī ]: agar
瓊樓玉宇 [ qióng lóu yù yǔ ]: bejeweled jade palace (idiom); sumptuous dwelling
瓊中 [ qióng zhōng ]: Qiongzhong Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 王 [ wáng ] king, ruler; royal; surname
    • 敻 [ xiòng ] remote, far away; preeminent
heisig_chinese_memo: The king has a fine jade which he wants to be chopped in half (so he can give the other half as a present), so he tells the taskmaster to find the person with the best eyes in the kingdom. He wears his helmet when the man is about to chop the fine jade because he's afraid of shrapnel blasting him in the face.
Ru_trainchinese:
qióng: (графема) нефрит
qióng: (сущ) (сокр.) провинция Хайнань
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The king is a venture capitalist and also likes to keep assets such as fine jade at his castle in the capital.
humanum_short_description_en: "Said the text": "Joan, Red Jade also from Yu Xiong sound Qiong, Joan or from propitious Wei, Joan or from Gui Xuan, Joan or from spin province....." " Joan ," but also for " Qiong ", " Wei "," "琁", refers to the red jade, and also means beautiful jade, refer to each word. "Guang Yun": "Joong, Yu Ming." "Poetry. "Papaya": "Vote me to papaya, and repay it to Qiongju."
humanum_short_description: 《說文》：「瓊，赤玉也。从玉敻聲。璚，瓊或从矞。瓗，瓊或从巂。琁，瓊或从旋省。」「瓊」又作「璚」、「瓗」、「琁」，指赤色的玉，又表示美玉，參各字。《廣韻》：「瓊，玉名。」《詩．木瓜》：「投我以木瓜，報之以瓊琚。」

(Simplified: 琼)
Pictophonetic: 敻 indicates the sound; 王 (jade) conveys the meaning.
Chinese: The king has a fine jade which he wants to be chopped in half (so he can give the other half as a present), so he tells the taskmaster to find the person with the best eyes in the kingdom. He wears his helmet when the man is about to chop the fine jade because he's afraid of shrapnel blasting him in the face.
Meaning: fine jade
Hanzi: 琼
Story: The king is a venture capitalist and also likes to keep assets such as fine jade at his castle in the capital.
Kind: traditional

瓊字的基本解释

瓊
qióng
见“琼”。

瓊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》渠營切，平清，羣。］
亦作“璚1”。亦作“瓗1”。“琼1”的繁体字。
(1)美玉。
(2)诗词中常以比喻色泽晶莹如琼之物。
(3)喻美女。
(4)古代博具，犹后来的骰子。
(5)古代方士用以炼丹的材料。
(6)传说中的井鬼名。
(7)地名。指古琼州府，即今海南省。有时亦指琼山县。
[②]［xuán］
［《集韻》旬宣切，平，邪。］
同“璿1”。同“璇1”。

瓊字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瓊； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页744第36
【廣韻】【正韻】渠營切【集韻】葵營切，?音煢。【說文】赤玉也。【詩·衞風】投我以木瓜，報之以瓊琚。【傳】瓊，玉之美者。【韻會】錢氏曰：詩言玉以瓊者多矣。瓊華，瓊英，瓊瑩，瓊瑤，瓊琚，瓊玖，皆謂玉色之美爲瓊，非玉之名也。許叔重云：瓊，赤玉也。然木瓜所謂瓊玖，玖乃黑玉。亦非赤也。　又【玉篇】積石爲樹，名曰瓊枝，其高一百二十仞，大三十圍，以琅玕爲之寶。【前漢·司馬相如傳】咀噍芝英兮嘰瓊華。【張揖註】瓊樹生崑崙西流沙濵，大三百圍，高萬仞，華蘂也，食之長生。　又人名。【古今注】魏文帝宮人絕愛者，有莫瓊樹，薛夜來，田尚衣，段巧笑，四人日夕在側。　又州名。漢朱厓郡。唐析置瓊州。　又【集韻】旬宣切，音旋。同琁。　又【韻補】叶渠陽切，音强。【楚辭·招魂】砥室翠翹，挂曲瓊些。翡翠珠被，爛齊光些。

瓊字的源字形

瓊字的起名意思

同“琼”，指美玉，也指美好的事物。

Joan
Basic explanation of words
Joan
qióng

Joan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" Qu Yingqie, Pingqing, Qun. ]
Also known as "璚1". Also known as "瓗1". Traditional characters of "琼1".
(1) Beautiful jade.
(2) The metaphor is often used in poems as a thing with a shining color and a beautiful color.
(3) Yu Meimei.
(4) Ancient pottery tools, still later dice.
(5) Materials used by ancient alchemists for alchemy.
(6) The legendary name of the well ghost.
(7) Place name. Refers to the ancient Qiongzhou Prefecture, which is now Hainan Province. Sometimes also refers to Qiongshan County.
[②]［xuán］
["Ji Yun" Xuan Xuan cut, flat, evil. ]
Same as "璿1". Same as "Xuan 1".
Joan

Qionghua, Qiongying, Qiongying, Qiongyao, Qiongju, and Qiongjiu, all said that the beauty of jade is Qiong, not the name of jade. Xu Shu Zhongyun: Qiong, Chi Yu also. However, papaya is called Qiongjiu, Jiu is black jade. Nor is it red.　[Jade Chapter] The stone is a tree, and its name is Qiongzhi. Its height is one hundred and twenty renminbi, and it is 30 yards in size. Langgan is the treasure. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Tsui, Zhiying and Qionghua. [Zhang Yi's Note] Qiong Shu was born in Kunlun West Liushapu, Dasanbaiwei, Gaowanren, Huaruiye, the longevity of food.　Another name. [Ancient and Modern Notes] The people of the Weiwen Emperor's Palace are the absolute beloved, there are Mo Qiongshu, Xue Yelai, Tian Shangyi, Duan Qiaoxiao, and the four are on the side day and night.　Also the name of the state. Hanzhuya County. Tang Shi set up Qiongzhou.　 [Ji Yun] Xuan Xuan cut, sound rotation. The same.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Quyang cuts, the sound is strong.
